forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 16C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. A few peeks of sunshine possible. High 59F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 52F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
